thread.title: North Wall warehouse gets go ahead for conversion to 60-bed hotel
thread.title_full: North Wall warehouse gets go ahead for conversion to 60-bed hotel

author: Madeleine Lyons
title: North Wall warehouse gets go ahead for conversion to 60-bed hotel
text:
North Wall warehouse gets go ahead for conversion to 60-bed hotel Paddy McKillen-backed Oakmount to build five floor hotel, bar and restaurant in strategic North Quay development zone about 12 hours ago Madeleine Lyons 
This area of the north docklands is fast becoming one of Dublin’s most active development hotspots A new hotel has been given the go ahead on Dublin’s North Wall Quay in an area of the city currently receiving significant investment. Oakmount , the investment arm of serial property and hospitality investment duo Paddy McKillen jr and Matt Ryan has been granted permission to convert a derelict warehouse to a five storey 60 bed hotel at 82 North Wall Quay, with roof top bar and restaurant, ground floor bar and restaurant, coffee shop and terrace.
